message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that $200 might be a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $150. I'm willing to pay a premium for a great product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

I can see that you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your honesty about your budget. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a fair price for it. I can offer it to you for $170. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.

I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still not sure if $170 is the right price for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $155. I think that's a fair price for a product that I'm interested in, but I'm not sure if it's worth more than that.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm not quite ready to accept $155. I think the product is worth more than that, and I'm willing to negotiate further. I can offer it to you for $165. It's a fair price that I'm comfortable with, and I think it's a good compromise.

I'm willing to meet you at $165, but I'm still not sure if that's the best price for me. I'd like to make one more counteroffer. I'm willing to go up to $160, but no higher. I think that's a fair price for a product that I'm interested in, and I'm willing to walk away if you're not willing to meet me at that price.

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go below $165. I think that's a fair price for the product, and I'm willing to hold firm at that price. If you're not willing to meet me at $165, I'm afraid I'll have to consider selling the product to someone else.
